languages.text: {n}Маражай издевательски смеется.{/n} "Верно, {name}! Все, что тебе нужно — это сосредоточиться на своих обязательствах".
{n}Marazhai laughs contemptuously.{/n} "Very true, {name}! All you need to do is focus on your obligations."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай издевательски смеется.{/n} "Верно, {name}! Все, что тебе нужно — это сосредоточиться на своих обязательствах".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai laughs contemptuously.{/n} "Very true, {name}! All you need to do is focus on your obligations."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai laughs contemptuously.{/n} "Very true, {name}! All you need to do is focus on your obligations."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋发出了轻蔑的大笑。{/n}“一点都没错，{name}！你唯一需要的事情，就是专心完成你的义务。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs contemptuously.{/n} "Very true, {name}! All you need to do is focus on your obligations."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋发出了轻蔑的大笑。{/n}“一点都没错，{name}！你唯一需要的事情，就是专心完成你的义务。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはバカにするかのように笑う。{/n}「最高だな、{name}！お前は義務に集中していればいい」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs contemptuously.{/n} "Very true, {name}! All you need to do is focus on your obligations."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはバカにするかのように笑う。{/n}「最高だな、{name}！お前は義務に集中していればいい」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai ríe desdeñosamente.{/n} «¡Muy cierto, {name}! Lo único que debes hacer es centrarte en tus obligaciones».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs contemptuously.{/n} "Very true, {name}! All you need to do is focus on your obligations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai ríe desdeñosamente.{/n} «¡Muy cierto, {name}! Lo único que debes hacer es centrarte en tus obligaciones».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lâche un rire méprisant.{/n} « Vous ne croyez pas si bien dire, {name} ! Tout ce que vous avez à faire, c'est vous concentrer sur la tâche qui vous incombe. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs contemptuously.{/n} "Very true, {name}! All you need to do is focus on your obligations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lâche un rire méprisant.{/n} « Vous ne croyez pas si bien dire, {name} ! Tout ce que vous avez à faire, c'est vous concentrer sur la tâche qui vous incombe. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lacht verächtlich.{/n} "Wie wahr, {name}! Ihr müsst Euch einzig auf Eure Verpflichtungen konzentrieren."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs contemptuously.{/n} "Very true, {name}! All you need to do is focus on your obligations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lacht verächtlich.{/n} "Wie wahr, {name}! Ihr müsst Euch einzig auf Eure Verpflichtungen konzentrieren."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs contemptuously.{/n} "Very true, ! All you need to do is focus on your obligations."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, kibir dolu bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Çok doğru {name}! Tek yapman gereken, yükümlülüklerine odaklanmak."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs contemptuously.{/n} "Very true, {name}! All you need to do is focus on your obligations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, kibir dolu bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Çok doğru {name}! Tek yapman gereken, yükümlülüklerine odaklanmak."
